biotools.summary: Java-based multiple sequence alignment tool that generates ProfileGrids for analysis and export. ProfileGrids are a new paradigm for visualizing and analyzing MSAs in a concise representation. For a protein sequence, a ProfileGrid matrix contains positional amino acid counts highlighted according to the frequency of the characters in the alignment.

bioschemas.name: JProfileGrid
